<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_cs_auto_resolution_intent_topic_map</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_cs_auto_resolution_intent_topic_map">active=true^ar_configurationISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="active" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/> <item endquery="false" field="ar_configuration" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>When intent topic map is activated</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var configGr = current.ar_configuration; if (!configGr.active) return;
var activeResponseChannels = global.AutoResolutionAPIHelper.getActiveResponseChannelsByConfiguration(configGr.sys_id); for (var i = 0; i < activeResponseChannels.length; i++) { if (activeResponseChannels[i] === global.AutoResolutionNotificationHelper.RESPONSE_CHANNEL.VA) return; }
gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('The Virtual Agent response channel must be active.')); current.active = previous.active; current.setAbortAction(true);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-06-08 22:05:55</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>038a8a7d379b2110fa1dd54174924b2b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>When intent topic map is activated</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">81ddf4a03c75311068bcf327dfe37fa6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_038a8a7d379b2110fa1dd54174924b2b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-09 22:16:40</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=038a8a7d379b2110fa1dd54174924b2b"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: When intent topic map is activated
